turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order some pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd really like to get two medium pizzas with thin crust and I would like one with sausage and all the peppers and the other one with mushrooms and arugula.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium thin crust pizzas, 1 sausage and peppers and one with mushroom and arugula, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $36, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be picking up, having it delivered, or dining in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to pick it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be delivered in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, I'd like to I'd like the pizzas to be pickup, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, your pizzas will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.
